Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView

Class PersonalStation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView.LocalStationPlayer
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView.PersonalStation
public class PersonalStation extends LocalStationPlayer
The class contains the information of a personal station of a player. It extends the class LocalStationPlayer and adds the following information: - the list of cards in hand; - the private goal card chosen; - the list of private goal cards from which to choose the private goal card; - the initial card.
